Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    FileHandler class for saving and loading game save files, levels and profiles.
    Author:
    Andrew Carruthers

                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

        Returns:
